pr_title: [BEAM-11074] Improve process for adding GPG keys to KEYS.

timeline.message:
[BEAM-11074] Improve process for adding GPG keys to KEYS.

This both adjusts the script so that PMC-hood isn't needed for adding keys to dev/KEYS, and adjusts the instructions in the release guide to add manual instructions for the process, based on the steps in the script. The instructions at the top of the KEYS file (the current recommendation) are a bit obtuse.

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure we need a "Run all commands manually" section at all if we have the script. Duplicating everything is cumbersome both to read and to edit. (BEAM-10048)
